name: Martin Glazier
body:
### Department of Philosophy, New York University

I'm a sixth-year PhD student at [NYU](http://philosophy.fas.nyu.edu/page/home). I work primarily in metaphysics, and I also have interests in the philosophy of physics and in the philosophy of science more broadly.

glazier at nyu dot edu

Office 413

5 Washington Place

New York, NY 10003
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
